pageContext.site: England, shropshire,preston upon the weald moors,in a field about 20 yards se of the culvert, where the crow brook croses the main road from kinley wick to preston. site marked on 6 inch o.s. shrops street 36 nw. marshy ground along edge of stream. dug up by a labourer, william pickering.

pageContext.remarks: Approx. Measurements,Drawn from tracing from a tracing from Ordnance Survey Note Book (original) 36 Plan 2 Salop.  Extract from O.N.B. "The rough sketch (full size) given below represents one of the sides of the Celt which Mr. Hooper showed me."
